channel.title: Sinisoul & Twitch Affair
channel.description:
[b]Setting[/b] I was mumbling Albi most of the day and checked twitch at some point to see Sinisoul streaming with three viewers. He was streaming him watching another guy in full screen while sleeping? (we heard him snore). It took me a while to figure out he was watching another guy lmao.
[b]Action[/b] Later in the day I check my twitch following page and he has 100+ viewers and isn't playing what he claims to be playing, still (hearthstone). So I link Albi that his chat is just being used for spam and random shit. He links the entirety of #mopar. At this point he is broadcasting his facebook page with four visible chats, two of interest: ebin (guy) and bonnie (girl), who everyone is talking about. Pics of convos below.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/hNVbCcB.png[/img]
tl;dr of convos: <bonnie> pls fudge me <ebin> bro wher u at
After many hitler and nazi-related spam some dude in chat proceeds to say something alone the lines of: ebin is bonnie's bf. This would mean sinisoul is cheating with bonnie on ebin who he's supposedly friends with. This leads to justice warrioring by randoms on twitch who add bonnie/ebin and show the convo. Some unfortunately proceed to flame bonnie for cheating.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/GfU3moN.png[/img]
Albi was calling sinisoul's skype with assorted profile names and images since everybody could see, some include: Jesus, Max B and random dick pics (to get his stream banned). Example below (SFW).
[img]https://i.imgur.com/hnZGNTA.png[/img]
He eventually gets banned (due to dick pics I suppose).
[img]https://i.imgur.com/ww9oO6f.png[/img]
At this point #mopar is just flaming sinisoul for being a prick and bonnie is being flamed (we catch wind of it now).
[b]Aftermath[/b] He first claimed he got hacked. Then he claims his headset fell on his keyboard and began the streaming, if so then how did his view change from: watching fullscreen stream to fb? He is mad at us and trying to clear up that bonnie wasn't going out with ebin but brolapse said he admitted to it? Now his mates are mad at him.
tl;dr
<jmood> still the verdict stands <jmood> never leave facebook open

item.title: Sinisoul & Twitch Affair
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

My hard drive got formatted too. That was nice. I think this is funny. I’ll explain a few of the pictures.

[quote=“Pure_, post:1, topic:550955”]Setting
I was mumbling Albi most of the day and checked twitch at some point to see Sinisoul streaming with three viewers. He was streaming him watching another guy in full screen while sleeping? (we heard him snore). It took me a while to figure out he was watching another guy lmao.

Action
Later in the day I check my twitch following page and he has 100+ viewers and isn’t playing what he claims to be playing, still (hearthstone). So I link Albi that his chat is just being used for spam and random shit. He links the entirety of #mopar. At this point he is broadcasting his facebook page with four visible chats, two of interest: ebin (guy) and bonnie (girl), who everyone is talking about. Pics of convos below.

tl;dr of convos:
pls fudge me
bro wher u at

After many hitler and nazi-related spam some dude in chat proceeds to say something alone the lines of: ebin is bonnie’s bf. This would mean sinisoul is cheating with bonnie on ebin who he’s supposedly friends with. This leads to justice warrioring by randoms on twitch who add bonnie/ebin and show the convo. Some unfortunately proceed to flame bonnie for cheating.[/quote]

False. I mean it’s not cool telling a girl shes a whore, thirsty, and all these other things. I don’t care about the flame directed at me, its not warranted…at all but whatever. If you have a bone to pick with me you can say it here.

[img]https://i.imgur.com/GfU3moN.png[/img]

Albi was calling sinisoul’s skype with assorted profile names and images since everybody could see, some include: Jesus, Max B and random dick pics (to get his stream banned). Example below (SFW).

He eventually gets banned (due to dick pics I suppose).

Yeah thanks assholes, I can’t use twitch for a day. Real funny.

[img]https://i.imgur.com/ww9oO6f.png[/img]

At this point #mopar is just flaming sinisoul for being a prick and bonnie is being flamed (we catch wind of it now).

[b]Aftermath[/b] He first claimed he got hacked. Then he claims his headset fell on his keyboard and began the streaming, if so then how did his view change from: watching fullscreen stream to fb? He is mad at us and trying to clear up that bonnie wasn't going out with ebin but brolapse said he admitted to it? Now his mates are mad at him.

It’s not true. They aren’t. Ebin hasn’t even met her. He thought this was funny as hell though, we had a pint and laughed about it.

tl;dr

still the verdict stands
never leave facebook open

True story. I didn’t think it’d explode like that. At least it was just Bonnie saying she wants to fudge.

Here’s what I think happened: I think that my headset hit my keyboard (which was on the ground I was on my bed and passed out) then when I had no clue that my stream was going I swapped over to Facebook because I was supposed to meet with my boy when I woke up and then you guys got a visual of my Facebook.

No regrets.

I did get hacked though. Later when I got home. Harddrive contents were gone. Thank god I had a backup.

Read full topic
